attributes.action: Sort out the fireworks. Only have them for organised events and ban the rest.
attributes.additional_details: Because the local councils seem to do nothing so the laws need to be changed.
attributes.background: They upset and many humans of all ages and they are far to loud. Many animals domestic and wild are petrified by them. Why can't we have more silent or drone shows. Stop selling them to the public. Make sure the organised events are run properly and with lots of pre warnings of the events happening.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Limit the sale and use of Fireworks to licence holders only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
